creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: reverse copy: roundel: seated female figure inside a cathedral interior at R; standing angel at woman's L side; floral leaf border; backward inscription at bottom center
marks:
Inscription, Stamp

inscription in plate at bott in mirror writing at lower edge of plate: [MI BLON
provenance: Charles-Frédéric Mewès (Strasbourg, 1858-1914); [Kate Ganz, London; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: The Annunciation
